summary: A clerk in a government agency finds his unenviable life takes a turn for the horrific with the arrival of a new co-worker who is both his exact physical double and his opposite - confident, charismatic and seductive with women.
cast: Jesse Eisenberg|Mia Wasikowska|Wallace Shawn|Yasmin Paige|Noah Taylor|James Fox|Cathy Moriarty|Phyllis Somerville|Gabrielle Downey|Jon Korkes|Craig Roberts|Kobna Holdbrook-Smith|Susan Blommaert|Bruce Byron|J. Mascis|Tony Rohr|Karima Riachy|Tim Key|Andrew Gruen|Kim Noble|Morrison Thomas|Sally Hawkins|Lloyd Woolf|Lydia Fox|Stuart Silver|Christopher Morris|Chris O'Dowd|Donal Cox|Kierston Wareing|Paddy Considine|Dirk Van Der Gert|Liam Bewley|Gemma Chan|Nathalie Cox|Bhanu Alley|Daniel Chapple|Martin Crossingham|Danny|Catherine Delaloye|Lukas DiSparrow|Joanna Finata|Jeanie Gold|Zoe Grisedale|Steve Saunders|Rade Serbedzija|Georgie-May Tearle|Chuen Tsou|Natalia Warner
title: El doble
